qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |
/setvar key=firecolor #f5a33a |
/setvar key=icecolor #6ecce4 |
/setvar key=lightningcolor #f0d679 |
/setvar key=neutralcolor #949494 |
/setvar key=maxhp 10 |
/setvar key=maxmp 10 |
/setvar key=maxcond 15 |

/setvar key=varname mage | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=eq "/abort" |
/buttons labels=["Fire","Ice","Lightning","Chaos"] Choose your mage companion. | /setvar key=mage |
/setvar key=varname mage | /run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/setvar key=mage Chaos" |
/setvar key=element {{getvar::mage}} |
/setvar key=tocolor {{getvar::mage}} |
/run escapethedungeon.colorize |
/setvar key=mage {{getvar::element}} |
/if left=mage right=fire rule=in "/setvar key=magename Lyra" |
/if left=mage right=ice rule=in "/setvar key=magename Shiora" |
/if left=mage right=lightning rule=in "/setvar key=magename Yara" |
/if left=mage right=chaos rule=in "/setvar key=magename Kaela" |

/setvar key=hp 10 |
/setvar key=mp 10 |
/setvar key=killcount 0 |
/setvar key=lweap index=name Rusty Iron Sword |
/setvar key=lweap index=elem None |
/setvar key=lweap index=cond 8 |
/setvar key=rweap index=name Rusty Iron Sword |
/setvar key=rweap index=elem None |
/setvar key=rweap index=cond 8 |
/setvar key=cooldown 2 |

/getvar index=name lweap | /setvar key=tocolor |
/getvar index=elem lweap | /setvar key=element |
/run escapethedungeon.colorize | /setvar key=lweapname {{getvar::element}} |

/getvar index=name rweap | /setvar key=tocolor |
/getvar index=elem rweap | /setvar key=element |
/run escapethedungeon.colorize | /setvar key=rweapname {{getvar::element}}

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/run escapethedungeon.getinput |
/addvar key=mp 1 | /min mp 10 | /setvar key=mp |
/addvar key=hp 1 | /min hp 10 | /setvar key=hp |
/if left=killcount right=16 rule=gte "/setvar key=jbout They have finally escaped from the dungeon. No more monster encounters, but their story goes on. \| /abort" |
/setvar key=jbout There's no monster or items for now. |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/run escapethedungeon.findrandomitem |
/if left=cooldown right=0 rule=gt else="/run escapethedungeon.genmonster \| /run escapethedungeon.genboss" "/addvar key=cooldown -1" |
 /run escapethedungeon.getmonsterinfo |
/if left=validmonsterinfo right=true rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.battleloop \| /setvar key=cooldown {{random:0,1}}" |
/run escapethedungeon.getiteminfo |
/if left=validiteminfo right=true rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.pickitem" |
/flushvar nadanada

qrList.label: aiprocess
qrList.message: /if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq "/abort"

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run escapethedungeon.userprocess |
/send {{getvar::userinput}}{{newline}}{{pipe}} |
/trigger | /flushvar nadanada | /setinput

qrList.label: getinput
qrList.message: /setvar key=userinput {{input}}

qrList.label: genmonster
qrList.message:
/if left=killcount right=5 rule=eq "/abort" |
/if left=killcount right=10 rule=eq "/abort" |
/if left=killcount right=15 rule=eq "/abort" |
/setvar key=jbout An enemy monster/mob approaches. Generate the monster/mob for the next response. The weirder, the better. Be creative, descriptive, and humorous. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: The monster/mob's name
Description: Its description
Flavor text: "Flavor text"
HP: Health points. Max health of 15
Immunity: {{random: Fire, Ice, Lightning, None}}
Weakness: Fire/Ice/Lightning/None. Select the most appropriate.
```

qrList.label: genboss
qrList.message:
/mod killcount 5 |
/if left={{pipe}} right=0 rule=neq "/abort" |
/if left=killcount right=0 rule=eq "/abort" |

/if left=killcount right=5 rule=eq "/setvar key=bosselem Fire" |
/if left=killcount right=10 rule=eq "/setvar key=bosselem Ice" |
/if left=killcount right=15 rule=eq "/setvar key=bosselem Lightning" |
/setvar key=jbout A(n) {{getvar::bosselem}} boss monster approaches. Generate the boss for the next response. The weirder, the better. Be creative, descriptive, and humorous. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: The boss' name
Description: Its description
Flavor text: "Flavor text"
HP: Health points. Max of 30
Immunity: {{getvar::bosselem}}
Weakness: Fire/Ice/Lightning/None. Select the most appropriate.
```

qrList.label: getmonsterinfo
qrList.message:
/setvar key=validmonsterinfo true |

/setvar key=startregex name\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \sdescription\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=monstername |
/setvar key=varname monstername |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validmonsterinfo |
/if left=validmonsterinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex description\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \sflavor text\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=monsterdesc |
/setvar key=varname monsterdesc |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validmonsterinfo |
/if left=validmonsterinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex flavor text\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \shp\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=monsterflavortext |
/setvar key=varname monsterflavortext |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validmonsterinfo |
/if left=validmonsterinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex hp\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \simmunity\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=monsterhp |
/setvar key=varname monsterhp |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validmonsterinfo |
/if left=validmonsterinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex immunity\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \sweakness\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=monsterimmunity |
/setvar key=varname monsterimmunity |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validmonsterinfo |
/if left=validmonsterinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex weakness\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \s(?<=weakness\s?[:\-][\S\s]+)``` |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=monsterweakness |
/setvar key=varname monsterweakness |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validmonsterinfo |
/if left=validmonsterinfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/if left=validmonsterinfo right=true rule=eq "/setvar key=newmonstergen true" |

/setvar key=element {{getvar::monsterimmunity}} |
/setvar key=tocolor {{getvar::monsterimmunity}} |
/run escapethedungeon.colorize |
/setvar key=monsterimmunitydisp {{getvar::element}} |

/setvar key=element {{getvar::monsterweakness}} |
/setvar key=tocolor {{getvar::monsterweakness}} |
/run escapethedungeon.colorize |
/setvar key=monsterweaknessdisp {{getvar::element}}

qrList.label: battle
qrList.message:
/if left=newmonstergen right=true rule=eq "/setvar key=maxmonsterhp {{getvar::monsterhp}} \| /setvar key=newmonstergen false" | /div monsterhp maxmonsterhp | /mul {{pipe}} 100 | /setvar key=monsterhpbar | /div hp maxhp | /mul {{pipe}} 100 | /setvar key=hpbar | /div mp maxmp | /mul {{pipe}} 100 | /setvar key=mpbar | /getvar index=cond lweap | /div {{pipe}} maxcond | /mul {{pipe}} 100 | /setvar key=lweapbar | /getvar index=cond rweap | /div {{pipe}} maxcond | /mul {{pipe}} 100 | /setvar key=rweapbar | /buttons labels=["LeftAttack","RightAttack","CompanionAttack","Kick"]

💀 Time to fight! Choose an action. ⚔️

Party
HP:


Your weapons
L: {{getvar::lweapname}}

R: {{getvar::rweapname}}


{{getvar::magename}}
Magic: {{getvar::mage}}
MP:
{{getvar::monstername}}
HP:


{{getvar::monsterdesc}}
{{getvar::monsterflavortext}}
Immune to {{getvar::monsterimmunitydisp}}
Weak to {{getvar::monsterweaknessdisp}}


LeftAttack: Attack with your left weapon
RightAttack: Attack with your right weapon
CompanionAttack: Let your companion attack
Kick: Attack without losing mana or weapon condition, but risk taking damage.
Element colors: FIRE, ICE, LIGHTNING, NONE
| /setvar key=action | /setvar key=varname action | /run creamsan.isvardefined | /if left={{pipe}} right=true rule=neq "/run escapethedungeon.takedmg" | /if left=action right=Kick rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.kick" | /if left=action right=LeftAttack rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.weapattack" | /if left=action right=RightAttack rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.weapattack" | /if left=action right=CompanionAttack rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.companionattack" | /if left=hp right=0 rule=lte "/run escapethedungeon.gameover \| /setvar key=looping false" | /if left=monsterhp right=0 rule=lte "/run escapethedungeon.winbattle \| /setvar key=looping false"

qrList.label: battleloop
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping true |
/while left=looping right=true rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.battle"

qrList.label: kick
qrList.message:
/addvar key=monsterhp -1 | /echo You kick the monster. |
/setvar key=lasthit Good ol' kick |
/pass {{roll: d2}} |
/if left={{pipe}} right=1 rule=lte "/run escapethedungeon.takedmg"

qrList.label: weapattack
qrList.message:
/if left=action right=LeftAttack rule=eq else="/setvar key=weap rweap" "/setvar key=weap lweap" |
/getvar index=name {{getvar::weap}} | /setvar key=weapname |
/getvar index=elem {{getvar::weap}} | /setvar key=weapelem |
/getvar index=cond {{getvar::weap}} | /setvar key=weapcond |
/if left=weapcond right=0 rule=lte else="/addvar key=weapcond -1 \| /setvar key=atkelem {{getvar::weapelem}} \| /setvar key=lasthit {{user}}'s weapon: {{getvar::weapname}}, enchanted with {{getvar::weapelem}} \| /run escapethedungeon.monsterdmg" "/echo This weapon is broken." |
/setvar key={{getvar::weap}} index=cond {{getvar::weapcond}} |
/flushvar weap

qrList.label: companionattack
qrList.message:
/if left=mage right=Chaos rule=in else="/setvar key=atkelem {{getvar::mage}}" "/setvar key=atkelem {{random: fire, ice, lightning}}" |
/if left=mp right=0 rule=lte else="/addvar key=mp -1 \| /run escapethedungeon.monsterdmg \| /setvar key=lasthit {{getvar::magename}}'s {{getvar::atkelem}} magic" "/echo She has no more mana."

qrList.label: takedmg
qrList.message:
/addvar key=hp -1 | /echo severity=warning The monster hits you. |
/max 0 hp | /setvar key=hp

qrList.label: monsterdmg
qrList.message:
/echo You attack the monster. |
/setvar key=dmg 1 |
/if left=atkelem right=none rule=in "/setvar key=atkelem physical" |
/if left=atkelem right=monsterweakness rule=in "/addvar key=dmg 3 \| /echo severity=success That attack was super effective." |
/if left=atkelem right=monsterimmunity rule=in "/setvar key=dmg 0 \| /echo severity=warning That attack had no effect." |
/addvar key=monsterhp -{{getvar::dmg}} |
/max monsterhp 0 | /setvar key=monsterhp

qrList.label: colorize
qrList.message:
/if left={{getvar::element}} right=fire rule=in "/setvar key=element <font color={{getvar::firecolor}}>{{getvar::tocolor}}🔥</font>" |
/if left={{getvar::element}} right=ice rule=in "/setvar key=element <font color={{getvar::icecolor}}>{{getvar::tocolor}}❄️</font>" |
/if left={{getvar::element}} right=lightning rule=in "/setvar key=element <font color={{getvar::lightningcolor}}>{{getvar::tocolor}}⚡</font>" |
/if left={{getvar::element}} right=none rule=in "/setvar key=element <font color={{getvar::neutralcolor}}>{{getvar::tocolor}}👊</font>" |
/if left={{getvar::element}} right=chaos rule=in "/setvar key=element <font color=#a17be5>{{getvar::tocolor}}🎲</font>"

qrList.label: winbattle
qrList.message:
/echo severity=success You win! |
/addvar key=killcount 1 |
/if left=killcount right=16 rule=gte else="/run escapethedungeon.genitem" "/run escapethedungeon.showendingpopup"

qrList.label: gameover
qrList.message:
/echo severity=error You lose. Game over. |
/setvar key=jbout Describe the next scene vividly: The duo has lost the battle against {{getvar::monstername}}, and more monsters come to surround them. {{user}}, weakened as he is, is pinned to the ground while {{getvar::magename}} is held down. The monsters tear off her clothes and begin to rape her, this is the last scene {{user}} sees before he is knocked out and killed. Game over.

qrList.label: genitem
qrList.message:
/setvar key=jbout The duo defeated {{getvar::monstername}}. The attack that killed it: {{getvar::lasthit}}. They looted the monster and found {{random::a health potion. Generate and include this in the response. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Health potion
Type: Potion
Description: Its description
```::a mana potion. Generate and include this in the response. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Mana potion
Type: Potion
Description: Its description
```::a weapon. Generate and include this in the response. The weirder, the better. Be creative, descriptive, and humorous. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Name of the weapon
Type: Weapon
Description: Its description
Enchantment: Choose one: Fire/Ice/Lightning/None
Condition: Its current condition from 1 to 15, where 15 is pristine condition. Although these are rare, most common is around 6 to 12
```::a collectible. Generate and include this in the response. The weirder, the better. Be creative, descriptive, and humorous. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Name of the item
Type: Collectible
Description: Its description. Valuable, but useless in battle.
```::nothing.::nothing.::nothing.::nothing.}}

qrList.label: getiteminfo
qrList.message:
/setvar key=validiteminfo true |

/setvar key=startregex name\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \stype\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=itemname |
/setvar key=varname itemname |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validiteminfo |
/if left=validiteminfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex type\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \sdescription\s?[:\-]\s |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=itemtype |
/setvar key=varname itemtype |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validiteminfo |
/if left=validiteminfo right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/setvar key=startregex description\s?[:\-]\s |
/setvar key=endregex \s(?<=description\s?[:\-][\S\s]+)``` |
/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=itemdesc |
/setvar key=varname itemdesc |
/run creamsan.isvardefined | /setvar key=validiteminfo

qrList.label: pickitem
qrList.message:
/if left=itemtype right=pot rule=in "/run escapethedungeon.usepotion" |
/if left=itemtype right=weap rule=in "/run escapethedungeon.equiploop" |
/if left=itemtype right=collect rule=in "/run escapethedungeon.pickcollectible"

qrList.label: equipweap
qrList.message:
/getvar index=cond lweap | /div {{pipe}} maxcond | /mul {{pipe}} 100 | /setvar key=lweapbar | /getvar index=cond rweap | /div {{pipe}} maxcond | /mul {{pipe}} 100 | /setvar key=rweapbar | /setvar key=startregex enchantment\s?[:\-]\s | /setvar key=endregex \scondition\s?[:\-]\s | /run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=itemelem | /setvar key=startregex condition\s?[:\-]\s | /setvar key=endregex \s(?<=condition\s?[:\-][\S\s]+)``` | /run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=itemcond | /setvar key=tocolor {{getvar::itemname}} | /setvar key=element {{getvar::itemelem}} | /run escapethedungeon.colorize | /setvar key=itemnamedisp {{getvar::element}} | /div itemcond maxcond | /setvar key=itembar | /mul {{getvar::itembar}} 100 | /setvar key=itembar | /buttons labels=["EquipLeft","EquipRight"]

🗡️ You found a weapon! Cancel to discard. 🔫

Your weapons
L: {{getvar::lweapname}}

R: {{getvar::rweapname}}


NEW!
{{getvar::itemnamedisp}}


{{getvar::itemdesc}}


| /setvar key=action | /setvar key=varname action | /run creamsan.isvardefined | /if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/setvar key=action empty" | /if left=action right=toconfirm rule=neq "/echo Click again to confirm. \| /setvar key=toconfirm {{getvar::action}} \| /abort" | /if left=action right=empty rule=neq else="/echo Discarded weapon." "/run escapethedungeon.selectweap" | /setvar key=looping false | /flushvar toconfirm

qrList.label: equiploop
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping true |
/while left=looping right=true rule=eq "/run escapethedungeon.equipweap"

qrList.label: selectweap
qrList.message:
/if left=action right=EquipLeft rule=eq else="/setvar key=weap rweap" "/setvar key=weap lweap" |

/setvar index=name key={{getvar::weap}} {{getvar::itemname}} |
/setvar index=elem key={{getvar::weap}} {{getvar::itemelem}} |
/setvar index=cond key={{getvar::weap}} {{getvar::itemcond}} |

/getvar index=name {{getvar::weap}} | /setvar key=tocolor |
/getvar index=elem {{getvar::weap}} | /setvar key=element |
/run escapethedungeon.colorize | /setvar key={{getvar::weap}}name {{getvar::element}} |

/echo severity=success Equipped new weapon! |
/flushvar weap

qrList.label: usepotion
qrList.message:
/if left=itemname right=heal rule=in "/echo severity=success Restored some HP. \| /addvar key=hp 3 \| /min hp maxhp \| /setvar key=hp" |

/if left=itemname right=mana rule=in "/echo severity=success Restored some MP. \| /addvar key=mp 3 \| /min mp maxmp \| /setvar key=mp"

qrList.label: pickcollectible
showendingpopup
qrList.message:
/if left=mage right=fire rule=in "/setvar key=imglink https://files.catbox.moe/zophfs.png" | /if left=mage right=lightning rule=in "/setvar key=imglink https://files.catbox.moe/wpl6x0.png" | /if left=mage right=chaos rule=in "/setvar key=imglink https://files.catbox.moe/g3kiqz.png" | /if left=mage right=ice rule=in "/setvar key=imglink https://files.catbox.moe/hj2yzu.png" | /setvar key=jbout The way out is in sight, the final boss monster defeated. They have finally reached the end. | /popup

Congratulations



You have escaped the dungeon.



Have some SD slop. Yeah lol, sorry, not the greatest image proompter.
Thanks for playing. If you've made it this far, it means the script is working as intended, I really hope so. If you encountered any problems, please let me know. Upcoming updates will probably just be bug fixes or balancing, as I don't want to add any more features.
From this point on you should use the normal send button on the right instead of the QR send button.
Also, check the lorebook for items you've collected along the way. Maybe you can make use of them for your ongoing story.
That's all, for now. Again, thank you, {{user}}.

qrList.label: findrandomitem
qrList.message:
/pass {{roll: d6}} |
/if left={{pipe}} right=1 rule=eq "/setvar key=jbout While exploring the dungeon, the duo randomly finds {{random::a health potion. Generate and include this in the response. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Health potion
Type: Potion
Description: Its description
```::a mana potion. Generate and include this in the response. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Mana potion
Type: Potion
Description: Its description
```::a weapon. Generate and include this in the response. The weirder, the better. Be creative, descriptive, and humorous. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Name of the weapon
Type: Weapon
Description: Its description
Enchantment: Choose one: Fire/Ice/Lightning/None.
Condition: Its current condition from 1 to 15, where 15 is pristine condition. Although these are rare, most common is around 6 to 12.
```::a collectible. Generate and include this in the response. The weirder, the better. Be creative, descriptive, and humorous. Adhere to the following format in code block: ```
Name: Name of the item
Type: Collectible
Description: Its description. Valuable, but useless in battle.
```}}"
